verbose_text: SGK3, similar to many other AGC kinases including Akt isoforms, is activated following phosphorylation of its catalytic domain T-loop motif (Thr 320) by PDK1 and its non catalytic C-terminal hydrophobic motif (Ser 486) by mTOR [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylation of its catalytic domain T-loop motif (Thr 320 ) by PDK1 and its non-catalytic C-terminal hydrophobic motif (Ser 486 ) by mTOR
